title: AlphaEther
author: AlphaEther
content: Do you know? Once upon a time The founder of Bitcoin Satoshi Nakamoto used this forum to update news about bitcoin. And also bitcointalk forum was created by Satoshi Nakamoto.   His post still available here? I want to see his post. Please tell me how I can find those posts.

comments.author: mindrust
comments.body: You can't find satoshi anymore.Upon his death, we buried his body on a green hill full of flowers looking down a river. The place is known only by the early adopters of this forum and they won't let you go anywhere near because we don't want any newbies disturbing the memory of our prophet. Now go away in peace and forget satoshi ever lived here.

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: Quote from: AlphaEther on August 27, 2022, 06:40:58 AMDo you know? Once upon a time The founder of Bitcoin Satoshi Nakamoto used this forum to update news about bitcoin. And also bitcointalk forum was created by Satoshi Nakamoto.   His post still available here? I want to see his post. Please tell me how I can find those posts.This is the profile of SatoshiHe/she/them were last active in the forum since 13th December 2010.He/she/they is the cofounder of this wunderful Bitcointalk forum.You can find all his post in his profile.

comments.author: hosemary
comments.body: Satoshi has never posted in bitcointalk.org.At the time Satoshi was active, the forum was being hosted on bitcoin.org and it was accessible through forum.bitcoin.org. In August 2011, theymos moved the forum from forum.bitcoin.org to bitcointalk.org.Click here for more information.

comments.author: Jeger.Kiting
comments.body: Quote from: AlphaEther on August 27, 2022, 06:40:58 AMDo you know? Once upon a time The founder of Bitcoin Satoshi Nakamoto used this forum to update news about bitcoin. And also bitcointalk forum was created by Satoshi Nakamoto.   His post still available here? I want to see his post. Please tell me how I can find those posts.I have a recommendation about the discussion thread you made here about Satoshi Nakamoto, but I don't know if it's true or not about the people who provided the discussion in the first thread posted on this forum by Satoshi Nakamoto. You can see here. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5282026.0In that thread you can see something about Satoshi Nakamoto's last post, I don't know if it's true or not you can conclude there yourself.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Yes, his posts are still there just go to his profile. Now that the profile has already been given to you, the purpose for this thread has already been served.You can close this thread already then.
